```{r}

#View(flooding_df)
high_tide = 2.5
low_tide = -2.5
sea_sd = 3
prob_flood_high = (pnorm(5, mean = high_tide, sd = sea_sd, lower.tail = FALSE))
prob_flood_high

prob_flood_low = (pnorm(5, mean = low_tide, sd = sea_sd, lower.tail = FALSE))
prob_flood_low

```

```{r}

mid_25_2050 = 11*meter_in_conv

high_est_2050 = 31*meter_in_conv
```
